title: math: Quaternion::GetLog return type is confusing

content.raw:
Is there a reason why `Quaternion::GetLog` returns the exponential coordinates as a `Quaternion` instead of a `Vector3`? Really a such a function should return the skew-symmetric matrix corresponding to an element of so(3), but returning the angular velocity vector isn't too crazy of a thing to do. The current API could be confusing and lead to errors.
